zh-Hant.title: 逃離信息繭房
zh-Hant.prompt: Below is a set of words that form an information cocoon. You need to output information related to these words based on a number I give (up to 100). The larger the number, the less relevant the information you provide should be to the information cocoon. The entire conversation and instructions should be provided in Chinese. Please respond according to this principle, and parse and respond to the following words:
zh-Hant.description: 我給你一組詞，你以這組詞及它們相關信息構成一個信息繭房，然後輸出與信息繭房無關的信息，我輸入數字，最大數字是 100，數字越大輸出的信息與信息繭房中的信息關係越遠。
zh-Hant.remark: 用來發現自己所不瞭解的知識。來自 @ergf991 的投稿。

metaDescription: 受困於繭房？發現與您日常興趣無關的隨機信息。拓寬視野，打破信息繭房！立即嘗試！
